title: Himi 333
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Kapau ‘oku ue’i au,
‘E he me’a ‘o māmani,
Ke u hoko ai ki he ngāue,
‘Eiki, ‘oku ke ‘ilo’i!
2.
Ko e ‘ofa ‘a Kalaisi,
‘Oku fa’a ue’i au;
Ke u kumi, ke fakahaofi,
‘A e kāinga kuo hē.
3.
Kau fa’a fai, pea u tangi,
Pea u feinga ke u hamusi;
‘A e ngaahi laumālie,
Mei he luo ko heli.
4.
Kapau ‘e manuki’i au,
‘I he me’a ‘oku ou fai;
‘Eiki, ke ke tokoni au,
Pea u fie mālie ai.
5.
Pea kapau ‘oku ‘aonga,
‘Eiki, ki ho’o ngāue,
‘Eku mo’ui ko eni,
Ke ke fa’iteliha ki ai.
6.
‘I he’eku ma’u tokoni,
‘Eiki, ‘i he ‘Afiona,
Pea u ngāue fai ma’u ai pē
Ko ho fakamo’oni au. *
